descriptionHtml:
Attack Pattern Information

ItemValue
Pattern IDXSS_REFL_013
Nameonmouseover event handler injection
CategoryXSS
Subcategoryreflected_xss
SeverityHIGH

Attack Details

  • Payload: <a onmouseover=alert(1)>hover</a>
  • Encoded: %3Ca%20onmouseover%3Dalert(1)%3Ehover%3C%2Fa%3E
  • Expected Detection: Yes

Test Execution Results

  • Status: PASSED
  • Detection Count: 1 / 1
  • Latency: ~40000ms
  • Timestamp: 01:16:06.000 UTC

Detection Evidence

Rule Name: [NGINX XSS] DOM-based XSS Attack test_id=XSS_REFL_013-1767402966785-3l46jk pattern_id=XSS_REFL_013 uri=/?q=%3Ca%20onmouseover%3Dalert(1)%3Ehover%3C%2Fa%3E client=127.0.0.1 method=GET
